events.name: School shooting in Izhevsk, Russia
events.wd_description: A gunman opened fire at a school in Izhevsk, central Russia, killing at least 15 people and injuring 24, including 11 children. The gunman, a former student of the school, killed himself at the scene.
events.description: A gunman opened fire at a school in Izhevsk, central Russia, killing at least 15 people and injuring 24, including 11 children. The gunman, a former student of the school, killed himself at the scene.

events.name: casualties
events.wd_description: Eleven children and four adults, including two security guards and two teachers, were killed in the shooting, and 24 others were injured, with only two of them not being children.
events.description: Eleven children and four adults, including two security guards and two teachers, were killed in the shooting, and 24 others were injured, with only two of them not being children.

events.name: panic inside the school
events.wd_description: Video footage showed panic inside the building, with children and adults running along the corridors and blood seen on the floor of a classroom, with children crouching underneath desks.
events.description: Video footage showed panic inside the building, with children and adults running along the corridors and blood seen on the floor of a classroom, with children crouching underneath desks.

events.name: details of the incident
events.wd_description: The gunman, a former student of the school, opened fire at the school with about 1,000 pupils in the city of Izhevsk and then killed himself at the scene.
events.description: The gunman, a former student of the school, opened fire at the school with about 1,000 pupils in the city of Izhevsk and then killed himself at the scene.

events.name: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_label: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.
events.description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.

events.name: Ukrainian strike
events.wd_description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.
events.description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.

events.name: Russian-installed authorities' report
events.wd_description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.
events.description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.

events.name: Ukraine's military statement
events.wd_description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.
events.description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.

events.name: Global Heatwave and Wildfire Impact
events.wd_description: Unprecedented high temperatures and widespread wildfires were reported globally, with record-breaking heat in the U.K. and fires causing evacuations in several countries.
events.description: Unprecedented high temperatures and widespread wildfires were reported globally, with record-breaking heat in the U.K. and fires causing evacuations in several countries.

events.name: High Temperatures
events.wd_description: Record-breaking temperatures of 40C were reported in the U.K., with similar heatwaves affecting regions across North America and beyond.
events.description: Record-breaking temperatures of 40C were reported in the U.K., with similar heatwaves affecting regions across North America and beyond.

events.name: Wildfires
events.wd_description: Wildfires prompted evacuations in France, Portugal, Spain, and other areas, with smoke and soot causing visibility issues as far as Argentina and Paraguay.
events.description: Wildfires prompted evacuations in France, Portugal, Spain, and other areas, with smoke and soot causing visibility issues as far as Argentina and Paraguay.

events.name: Climate Change Effects
events.wd_description: Experts link increased vegetation flammability and soil dryness to climate change, advising governments to plan for rising temperatures, with a noted reduction in wildfires due to changes in land use in Africa.
events.description: Experts link increased vegetation flammability and soil dryness to climate change, advising governments to plan for rising temperatures, with a noted reduction in wildfires due to changes in land use in Africa.

events.name: EV battery supply chain expansion
events.wd_description: Ford is expanding its EV battery supply chain to support its goals of producing 600,000 EVs annually by late 2023 and more than 2 million by 2026.
events.description: Ford is expanding its EV battery supply chain to support its goals of producing 600,000 EVs annually by late 2023 and more than 2 million by 2026.

events.name: sourcing battery capacity
events.wd_description: Ford has secured contracts for 60 GWh of annual battery capacity to support its 600,000 EV run rate and sourced 70% of the battery capacity needed to support its 2026 goal of over 2 million EVs annually.
events.description: Ford has secured contracts for 60 GWh of annual battery capacity to support its 600,000 EV run rate and sourced 70% of the battery capacity needed to support its 2026 goal of over 2 million EVs annually.

events.name: t: agreements with CATL
events.wd_description: CATL will provide LFP battery packs for Mustang Mach-E and F-150 Lightning models, with plans to explore further cooperation for global battery supply.
events.description: CATL will provide LFP battery packs for Mustang Mach-E and F-150 Lightning models, with plans to explore further cooperation for global battery supply.

events.name: t: agreements with LGES
events.wd_description: LGES has doubled its capacity at its Wroclaw, Poland, facility to support NCM cell production for Mustang Mach-E and E-Transit models.
events.description: LGES has doubled its capacity at its Wroclaw, Poland, facility to support NCM cell production for Mustang Mach-E and E-Transit models.

events.name: t: agreements with SK On
events.wd_description: SK On has scaled up NCM cell production in Atlanta and Hungary to support F-150 Lightning and E-Transit models.
events.description: SK On has scaled up NCM cell production in Atlanta and Hungary to support F-150 Lightning and E-Transit models.

events.name: securing raw materials
events.wd_description: Ford has sourced key raw materials for batteries, including nickel and lithium, through agreements with various global partners.
events.description: Ford has sourced key raw materials for batteries, including nickel and lithium, through agreements with various global partners.

events.name: t: nickel agreements
events.wd_description: Ford has signed MOUs with Vale Canada, PT Vale Indonesia, Huayou Cobalt, and BHP for nickel supply.
events.description: Ford has signed MOUs with Vale Canada, PT Vale Indonesia, Huayou Cobalt, and BHP for nickel supply.

events.name: t: lithium agreements
events.wd_description: Ford has secured lithium contracts with Liontown Resources, Rio Tinto, ioneer, Compass Minerals, and Syrah Resources.
events.description: Ford has secured lithium contracts with Liontown Resources, Rio Tinto, ioneer, Compass Minerals, and Syrah Resources.

events.name: expanding production facilities
events.wd_description: Ford is increasing its battery production capacity through new facilities and joint ventures.
events.description: Ford is increasing its battery production capacity through new facilities and joint ventures.

events.name: t: BlueOval SK joint venture
events.wd_description: Ford and SK On have formed the BlueOval SK joint venture to build three battery plants in Kentucky and Tennessee.
events.description: Ford and SK On have formed the BlueOval SK joint venture to build three battery plants in Kentucky and Tennessee.

events.name: t: Turkey joint venture
events.wd_description: Ford has signed an MOU with SK On and Koç Holdings to create a joint venture in Turkey for expanded battery capacity.
events.description: Ford has signed an MOU with SK On and Koç Holdings to create a joint venture in Turkey for expanded battery capacity.

events.name: t: North America localization
events.wd_description: Ford plans to localize 40 GWh of LFP capacity in North America starting in 2026.
events.description: Ford plans to localize 40 GWh of LFP capacity in North America starting in 2026.
